GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
rxrpc: fix a race in rxrpc_exit_net()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 864297ee30727ae6233f80296b7fc91442620b05, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit ace45bec6d77bc061c3c3d8ad99e298ea9800c2b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rxrpc: fix a race in rxrpc_exit_net()
